TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Habitat 1 - Rotating space station

Articles.Content:
This is a rotating space station habitat for Kerbals, in low (but stable) Kerbin orbit. 2 crew in the central hub, space for 48 inhabitants housed in luxurious artificial gravity in the surrounding ring. Comes equipped with 3 maintenance droids (although I think I may have messed these up as they aren't detaching properly), central docking hatches top and bottom in the hub.

The craft file includes the launcher, but it's very borderline - I needed to use half my monopropellant store with RCS to nudge it into stable orbit. No doubt someone better than me at this game could improve on that :-)

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24811943/Space%20Station%20Ascent.craft
Love it. Modified it a bit to lessen the lag on my PC, but otherwise its great. Slapped some quad docking ports on it to interface with Temstar's Olympus II fuel depot.
